title: How do I become a troll investor?
text: It is simple: Just think of the companies that you would like to see fail and invest in them! That way, if they fail, you are happy because you were right. If they succeed, you are happy because you made money. Win-Win!

section.title: How do I select?
section.content: Do a test to see that what kind of troll you are! (note that this is not a recommendation, you always have to make your own decision). Remember we are trolls!

section.title: I know which companies I don't like, what now?
section.content: If you don't already have a broker here are some brokers that you can chose from. Remember to always do your own research and make your own decision. And Invest like a troll!
